ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have fear of the Fire which has been prepared for the kafirun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Keep away from the Fire prepared for the infidels;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And have fear of the Fire which awaits those who deny the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Save yourselves from the fire which is prepared for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And save yourselves from the fire which is prepared for disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And fear the Fire, which is prepared for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And guard yourselves against the fire which has been prepared for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And fear the Fire prepared for the unbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And ward off (from yourselves) the Fire prepared for disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: guard yourself against the Fire prepared for those who deny the truth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And beware of the Fire gotten ready for the infidels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Beware of the Fire, which has been prepared for the faithless,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Fear the Fire, which is repaired for those who reject Faith:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And fear the Fire, which is prepared for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Guard yourselves against the Fire prepared for unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And guard yourselves against the Fire that is prepared for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fear the Fire, which has been prepared for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:131] And fear the Fire that has been prepared for the disbelievers, lest you be chastised with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 70 (And ward off (from yourselves) the Fire) fear the Fire regarding the consumption of usury which was (prepared) created (for disbelievers) in Allah and in the prohibition of usury.
